name: io.github.xxxbrian/mcp-rquest
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that provides advanced HTTP request capabilities for Claude and other LLMs. Built on rquest, this server enables realistic browser emulation with accurate TLS/JA3/JA4 fingerprints, allowing models to interact with websites more naturally and bypass common anti-bot measures. It also supports converting PDF and HTML documents to Markdown for easier processing by LLMs.

tools.name: http_get
tools.description: Perform GET requests with optional parameters

tools.name: http_head
tools.description: Retrieve only headers from a resource

tools.name: get_stored_response
tools.description: Retrieve stored large responses, optionally by line range

tools.name: get_stored_response_with_markdown
tools.description: Convert HTML or PDF responses to Markdown format for better LLM processing

tools.name: get_model_state
tools.description: Get the current state of the PDF models loading process

tools.name: restart_model_loading
tools.description: Restart the PDF models loading process if it failed or got stuck
